title: There's ‘no relief in sight’ for high trucking costs: BofA - Yahoo Finance
content: There's ‘no relief in sight’ for high trucking costs: BofA  Yahoo Finance
description: A massive shortage of truckers continues to be a bottleneck for supply chains across North America, serving as a significant factor in the American inflation story and leading to skyrocketing trucking costs. According to a recent Bank of America Global Research report, the crunch seen in the trucking industry is showing no signs of abating.
